INSERT INTO wms_picture_album ( album_name, album_desc, operator_id, operator_name, site_id, update_time, create_time ) VALUES ( #{albumName}, #{albumDesc}, #{operatorId}, #{operatorName}, #{siteId}, NOW(), NOW() )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS albumId
mapper.update: UPDATE wms_picture_album SET album_name=#{albumName}, album_desc=#{albumDesc}, operator_id=#{operatorId},operator_name=#{operatorName} WHERE album_id=#{albumId}
mapper.select: SELECT wms_picture.picture_id AS pictureId, wms_picture.picture_name AS pictureName, wms_picture.picture_url AS pictureUrl, wms_picture.brief_desc AS briefDesc, wms_picture.detail_desc AS detailDesc, wms_picture.hyperlink AS hyperlink, wms_picture.img_postfix AS imgPostfix FROM wms_picture WHERE wms_picture.picture_album_id = #{id} AND wms_picture.data_status = 0 ORDER BY wms_picture.picture_order asc

SELECT wms_picture.picture_id AS pictureId, wms_picture.picture_name AS pictureName, wms_picture.picture_url AS pictureUrl, wms_picture.brief_desc AS briefDesc, wms_picture.detail_desc AS detailDesc, wms_picture.hyperlink AS hyperlink, wms_picture.img_postfix AS imgPostfix, wms_picture.picture_order AS pictureOrder FROM wms_picture WHERE wms_picture.picture_album_id = #{id} AND wms_picture.data_status = 0 AND wms_picture.is_review = 1 ORDER BY wms_picture.picture_order asc

SELECT wms_picture.picture_id AS pictureId, wms_picture.picture_name AS pictureName, wms_picture.picture_url AS pictureUrl, wms_picture.brief_desc AS briefDesc, wms_picture.detail_desc AS detailDesc, wms_picture.img_postfix AS imgPostfix FROM wms_picture WHERE wms_picture.picture_album_id = #{id} AND wms_picture.data_status = 0 AND wms_picture.is_review = 0 ORDER BY wms_picture.picture_order asc

SELECT tmp.album_id AS albumId, tmp.album_name AS albumName, tmp.album_status AS albumStatus, tmp.album_desc AS albumDesc, tmp.operator_id AS operatorId, tmp.operator_name AS operatorName, COUNT(tmp.picture_id) AS review_is FROM ( SELECT wpa.album_id, wpa.album_name, wpa.album_status, wpa.album_desc, wpa.operator_id, wpa.operator_name, wpa.create_time, wp.picture_id FROM wms_picture_album AS wpa LEFT JOIN wms_picture AS wp ON wpa.album_id = wp.picture_album_id AND wp.is_review=0 ) AS tmp
GROUP BY tmp.album_id ORDER BY tmp.create_time DESC

SELECT wpa.album_id, wpa.album_name , wpa.album_status, wpa.album_desc , wpa.operator_id , wpa.operator_name, (select count(1) from wms_picture where wms_picture.picture_album_id=wpa.album_id) AS review_is, wpat.album_type_id , wpat.album_type_name FROM wms_picture_album AS wpa left join wms_picture_album_rel_type wpart on wpa.album_id=wpart.album_id left join wms_picture_album_type as wpat on wpart.album_type_id=wpat.album_type_id WHERE wpa.album_status=0
AND wpa.album_name like '%${albumName}%'
AND wpat.album_type_id = #{albumTypeId}
ORDER BY wpa.create_time DESC

SELECT wms_picture_album_type.album_type_id AS albumTypeId, wms_picture_album_type.album_type_pid AS albumTypePid, wms_picture_album_type.album_type_name AS albumTypeName FROM wms_picture_album_type INNER JOIN wms_picture_album_rel_type ON wms_picture_album_rel_type.album_type_id=wms_picture_album_type.album_type_id AND wms_picture_album_rel_type.album_id=#{id} WHERE wms_picture_album_type.album_status=0

SELECT wms_picture_album.album_id AS albumId, wms_picture_album.album_name AS albumName, wms_picture_album.album_status AS albumDesc FROM wms_picture_album INNER JOIN wms_picture_album_rel_type ON wms_picture_album_rel_type.album_id=wms_picture_album.album_id AND wms_picture_album_rel_type.album_type_id=#{id} WHERE wms_picture_album.album_status=0 ORDER BY wms_picture_album.update_time DESC

SELECT wms_picture.picture_id AS pictureId, wms_picture.picture_name AS pictureName, wms_picture.picture_url AS pictureUrl, wms_picture.brief_desc AS briefDesc, wms_picture.detail_desc AS detailDesc, wms_picture.img_postfix AS imgPostfix, wms_picture.hyperlink AS hyperlink FROM wms_picture WHERE wms_picture.picture_album_id = #{id} AND wms_picture.data_status = 0 AND wms_picture.is_review = 1 ORDER BY wms_picture.picture_order asc LIMIT #{limitNum}
